content.summary: MBA graduate from IIM Rohtak with a strong academic background and relevant work experience in supply chain management, customer relationship management, and sales. Possesses leadership skills demonstrated through roles as Volleyball Vice Captain and NCC Cadet. Certified in Six Sigma Black Belt, Project Management, Customer Relationship Management, and B2B Brand Strategy.

experience.title: Operations Intern
experience.responsibilities: Spearheaded strategic sourcing initiatives, negotiated favorable contracts, streamlined vendor communication and collaboration processes, implemented a robust vendor evaluation system.

experience.title: Sales Partner
experience.responsibilities: Promoted upcycled products, generated sales, engaged with customers to understand needs, collaborated on strategies to enhance brand visibility.

experience.title: Client Relationship Management Intern
experience.responsibilities: Enhanced customer experience, strengthened client relationships, analyzed client feedback, streamlined client onboarding.

projects.title: Rural Engagement Program
projects.objectives: Gather data on agriculture, health, and education sectors in Haryana villages.
projects.contributions: Recognized difficulties faced by locals, assessed the application and effects of various government programs, reviewed collected information and provided ideas for improvement.

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: Strong academic background with a GPA of 69.57% and above.
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Demonstrated initiative by leading projects, participating in internships, and obtaining certifications.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Demonstrated leadership skills as Volleyball Vice Captain, NCC Cadet, and Bharat Scout and Guide.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effective communication skills demonstrated through customer engagement roles.
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Strong analytical skills, strategic thinking, and problem-solving abilities.
